DataElement.preferredName: Systolic Blood Pressure Standing Evaluation Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the maximum arterial pressure occurring during contraction of the left ventricle of the heart while patient is standing or maintaining an erect upright position.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the systematic, objective appraisal of the blood pressure during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart while patient is standing or maintaining an erect upright position.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The blood pressure during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.

Concepts.definition: The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position.:Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.

Concepts.definition: The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the maximum arterial pressure occurring during contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: Move to caBIG context as teh preferred Rep class for Measurement
